lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs are considering bringing in a new Spanish translator for Aroldis Chapman after the star closer from Cuba struggled to answer questions about a past domestic violence case in his introductory news conference.

headline.print_headline: Cubs Considering New Translator for Star Closer Chapman
headline.main: Cubs Considering New Translator for Star Closer Chapman
